type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Epoli](https://epoli-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Teleport

---

_Entity Action Type_

This is used to teleport without having to use `apoli:execute_command`.

Type ID: `epoli:teleport`

---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
	"type": "epoli:teleport",
	"x": 10,
    "y": 11,
    "z": 50,
    "dimension": "minecraft:overworld"
}
```
This example will teleport the entity to 10, 11, 50 in the overworld.

## Teleport

---

_Entity Action Type_

This is used to teleport without having to use `apoli:execute_command`.

Type ID: `epoli:teleport`

---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
	"type": "epoli:teleport",
	"x": 10,
    "y": 11,
    "z": 50,
    "dimension": "minecraft:overworld"
}
```
This example will teleport the entity to 10, 11, 50 in the overworld.

dimension.description: The dimension you wish to teleport to, use `current` for the dimension the entity is in.
dimension.markdownDescription: The dimension you wish to teleport to, use `current` for the dimension the entity is in.
